attributes.action: Move upcoming bank holidays to later in the year if COVID-19 isolation continues
attributes.background: The recent COVID-19 outbreak has drastically altered daily life in the UK, isolating many from their families and loved ones. Parliament should defer upcoming bank holidays to later in the year so these special days can be used, when it is safe, for connecting and spending time with loved ones.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309243
